title: The 5 coolest things about the Giant Propel of Jayco AlUla in the 2023 Tour de France
content:
Jayco-AlUla has chosen Giant's lightweight aero road bike and paired it with a $20 part from Amazon.

Read the full article at The 5 coolest things about the Giant Propel of Jayco AlUla in the 2023 Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
